name: The Orion Conspiracy
storyline:
The Cerebus Deep Space Research complex, tentatively stationed by a black-hole has been witness to a chilling 'accident'. 
 
Research scientist Danny McCormack didn't stand a chance when an explosion in a service probe sent him tumbling into deep space beyond. 
 
Now the adventure begins as you play Devlin McCormack, discovering the truth about his son's death and stumbling into an intricate plot of intrigue, death and deceit. 
 
Nothing is as it seems... Trust no one...
summary: The Orion Conspiracy is a sci-fi point-and-click adventure game from Divide by Zero and Domark about a bereaved father trying to solve the mystery of his astronaut son's death.
